home.title: Hotel Waynapicchu
home.subtitle: A cosy hotel perfectly designed to turn your pleasant moments into a magical and unforgettable experience.
home.subtitle_section: Our Suite is probably the environment that most reflects the personality of the inhabitant and the most laborious to plan. The space requires comfort, hospitality and style to receive the most intimate moments of the user. That's where our deepest memories are, our favorite pieces.

CARDS_INFORMATION.title: SILVER
CARDS_INFORMATION.description: This room category offers a comfortable and convenient stay for guests who want to enjoy a room with extra beds and modern amenities, such as cable TV and landline, while having the privacy of their own bathroom.

CARDS_INFORMATION.title: Diamond
CARDS_INFORMATION.description: The Diamond category is designed to offer a high-end lodging experience with exclusive amenities such as the Jacuzzi, a private lounge area, and the added convenience of having an on-site bar. These features create a luxurious and comfortable environment for visitors looking for a truly indulgent stay.

CARDS_INFORMATION.title: Gold
CARDS_INFORMATION.description: The Gold category is designed to provide guests with a high-quality accommodation experience, with additional amenities such as a Jacuzzi and a lounge area, in addition to standard amenities such as cable TV and landline. This creates a luxurious and comfortable environment for visitors to the hotel.

article_3.title: Our Mission
article_3.description: To be leaders in the 2-star sector, managing to provide a personalized service helping to revalue the local culture of the destinations in which we are going to operate.

article_4.title: Our Vision
article_4.description: To be a company that contributes to the cultural and tourist development of the country, always having as a goal the quality of our services thanks to our valuable human team.

article_6.title: Our Team
article_6.description: The Waynapicchu Hotel team is made up of professionals with extensive experience in the sector, who give preference to personalized treatment, added value and one of the main reasons why many of our clients return to request our services during their visits. We welcome any suggestions, which will be immediately addressed by our management, for the constant improvement of the quality of the hotel
